EmailTemplate.description: Notification e-mail HTML sent when a internal case is closed (English)
EmailTemplate.name: IFG_Internal Case Close confirmation - e-mail HTML (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: Internal Case Closed - Case {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Note that this is an auto-reply message. Please do not respond to this email.
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your recent enquiry. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: "{!Case.Subject}" has now been created and a Customer Service Representative will contact you shortly. Please ensure you refer to this Case Number in any further contact with us about this enquiry.
Best regards, IATA Customer Service
{!Case.Thread_Id}
